data.name: Hunt Souleater
data.detailed_description:
HUNT SOULEATER is a PvPvE third-person shooter that 60 players are devided into hunter and souleater camps.

48 hunters are devided into 12 teams, and they tasks are destroy soulstone and temple on the Stramon Island where they should gather suplies、kill souleaters and monsters for survival. Hunters must finish the tasks in two days.

There are 12 souleaters who have super power. In the time 6:00-18:00, they will change to hunters untill the soulstones are destroied. If they kill all the hunters or fight over two days, they win. Be a big boss and roll over the small human being, why not?

Welcome to the Stramon Island! be a hunter or a big boss! fight!

data.short_description: HUNT SOULEATER is a PvPvE third-person shooter that 60 players are devided into hunter and souleater camps. Hunters besiege the Stramon Island where souleaters haunt to kill the souleaters and destroy the temple.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
